documents.title: Proposal for CIT Project
documents.description: The objective of this document is to detail the business requirements relevant to the CIT Platform which will be developed to perform Taxation. The CIT Platform will serve as a delivery engine to provide managed Taxation and analytics services such as :1)Client Master 2)Document Management 3)Recouncilation 4)Report Generator

documents.title: Proposal for Audit Project
documents.description: The objective of this document is to detail the business requirements relevant to the RAS Audit Management Tool (RAS-AMT) which will be developed to perform Internal Audits. The RAS-AMT will serve as a delivery engine to provide managed internal audit and analytics services such as: 1) Risk Assesment 2) Audit Planning  3)Audit Execution

documents.title: Proposal for Deals Project
documents.description: The objective of this document is to detail the business requirements relevant to the PwC Digital Accounting Manuals Platform (PwC DAMs) which will be developed to save, upload and make available to the users accounting manuals. The Digital Accounting Manual platform will serve as a delivery engine to provide managed accounting rules and documents services such as: 1) Centralized accounting standards view 2) User friendly interface for browsing and exporting accounting standards 3)Organizing and indexing content as per the user’s requirements
